channel.title: My Sig (Grabbing Life)
channel.description:
I havent done graffics in a while so here's one of my attemps

item.title: My Sig (Grabbing Life)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Dont like the text,way to orange,try using photo filter,colour balance and other effects to try and make it better. I can only give you a 5.10. And the lighting on his hand is just plain solid,try to dim it down a bit…

Read full topic

item.title: My Sig (Grabbing Life)
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

Awww Dang. ThAt didn’t post his C&C. He’d probably give you a 1/10. He gave me a 0! =D!

ANyways, the sig, it’s not that great. Maybe it’s cause you just starting doing sigs again. Coloring and contrast… Not that great. Try again.

Read full topic

thank sooo much guys and on my next sig, i will re-read your comments after i make it then edit from there

item.title: My Sig (Grabbing Life)
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

It’s a bit too monotone.
If it maybe had some more colors, it would look better. The lighting and overall feel of the sig is nice, but the color just kinda ruins it

Read full topic

item.title: My Sig (Grabbing Life)
item.dc:creator: @Ixl_Adds_Ixl Ixl Adds Ixl
item.description:
@Ixl_Adds_Ixl wrote:

Learn to give your test some styling interface like most people do ;D. Comes in handy when your in a competition considering text watermarts are hard to do, but you learn that giving it some style will help you out a lot. Text could be as simple as your but there would be a little block under it like 3 of them going from right to left. Idk about slogan, those suck unless the style would in between slogan and header.

Read full topic

item.title: My Sig (Grabbing Life)
item.dc:creator: @Son_of_Saetan Son of Saetan
item.description:
@Son_of_Saetan wrote:

Looks good, its good to see that you followed a nice color base through the whole sig. The text right on the edge is a no-no, unless you have a 1 pixel border (preferably black, for this sig) it doesn’t look all too good on the edge, bring it in a pixel on the bottom and left and it will be right

The faded hand idea on the right stands out as it should and I give it a thumbs up. The glowing orb could of been bigger which would gave it more effect and maybe brighten it more because it seems to be a good focus point on the sig.

7.9/10 Seems about right for that

Read full topic

item.description:
@javis wrote:

text is bad. Colors could use alot of work. Some ok effects. I like the vectorish bg. Over all its really bland try adding some new stuff
